General.Name: Wicaksana Overseas International
General.Description: Pt Wicaksana Overseas International Tbk engages in the distribution and trading of food, beverage, and other products in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Fast Moving Consumer Goods and Healthcare. It offers snacks, beverages, powdered milk, instant noodles, personal care products, cosmetics, medicines, household care products, cooking oil, and plastic materials. The company also provides pharmaceuticals, over the counter and consumer health products, and medical devices, as well as commercial, regulatory support, and distribution services. It operates through distribution centers. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. Pt Wicaksana Overseas International Tbk is a subsidiary of DKSH Holding AG.
General.Address: Jalan Ancol Barat VII, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14430
